sourcesContent: import { Component, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { SlickCarouselComponent } from 'ngx-slick-carousel'; import { SlickItemDirective } from 'ngx-slick-carousel/slick.component'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html', styleUrls: ['./home.component.css'] }) export class HomeComponent { slides = [ {img: 'assets/img1.jpg'}, {img: 'assets/img2.jpg'}, {img: 'assets/img3.jpg'}, ]; slideConfig = { slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1, dots: false, arrows: false, infinite: true, }; currentSlide = 0; onSlideChange(event: Event) { this.currentSlide = event.currentSlide; } }
